Title: About the MFA Office in Johor Bahru…
Paragraphs:
Recently we came across a Facebook post from Rilek1Corner, a Singapore-based website. The post said this:

This is old fake news.  We had previously debunked a similar message before, here.

The main thing about Rilek1Corner’s post that is false is that the Singapore Consulate-General’s office in Johor Bahru has no e-mail address.  The MFA Duty Office details are also outdated or incorrect.
Keep in mind that only the following is true!

Singapore Consulate General’s office in Johor Bahru Contact Details (See source here)Address:

Suite 35.02, Level 35, Johor Bahru City Square Office Tower 106-108, Jalan Wong Ah Fook, 80000 Johor Bahru
Opening Hours: Monday to Friday, 8.30am to 1pm, 2pm to 5pm, closed on Saturdays, Sundays and Public Holidays
Tel: +60-7-226-5012
Fax: +60-7-226-5013

Singapore MFA contact details (see source here):

Address: Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Tanglin, Singapore 248163
Tel: One Call Centre: 1800-476-8870 / MFA Main Telephone Number: +65-63798000 / MFA Duty Office: +65-63798000, +65-63798855
Fax: +65 64747885
E-mail: mfa@mfa.sg
Author: Faizal Kamal
